title: Family treasures
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Rural conditions
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children - Family relationships
abstract: 'I find it difficult to remember holidays before Aireys.'
description: Penny Morison provides a sensorial experience as she recalls her many holidays spent at the family holiday home in Aireys Inlet, on the south-west coast of Victoria. Run by her aunt, the holiday home has provided countless Summer memories for Penny as she was growing up and for future generations.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002067; Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (June 2010); Active; 2010
